name: Zfort Group
overview:
Zfort Group is a full scale IT outsourcing service provider that has delivered premium web development, consulting and B2B solutions since 2000.

As an IT outsourcing service provider, Zfort Group has the benefit of being based not only in one of the world’s most well-known and rapidly developing outsourcing destinations, but also in its major software development hub centre and Ukraine’s second largest city, Kharkov.

Zfort Group’s customers are a large and growing number of institutional clients and individuals from across the globe, including online marketing agencies, web design studios, major and middle-sized industrial companies, technology companies, startups, and other enterprises.

Our team consists of more than 140 professionals, eminently qualified in the following areas: PHP/MySQL and ASP.NET/MSSQL programming Creative Design SEO-friendly HTML/CSS coding Flash Animation and Action Script programming Quality Assurance iOS and Android software development Business analysis and consulting

We take great pride in the fact that we create excellent working conditions for our employees. As a result, you can be sure that you are dealing with a dedicated and highly motivated development team.
